divs: Sighting DetailsI was a Nocona Texas Police back in the mid 80s, I drove west of town on hwy 82, When i turned around goming back to town going east i looked up in the sky about 1:00 aclock high looking east, It looked like the flying disc you see in the movies, It rocked back and forth then shot out of site at a very high rate of speed. I just made a small note on my patrol log and did not tell any one about it. About three months later my department posted a phone number to call if we saw any ufos. another time i was down in the Nocona air port its in a valley very low, i was out side my patrol vehicle, I saw a bright light very high in the sky it went horison to horison in about 60 sec. I thouht it was neat to see a ufo but did not tell any one for a long time, End of report.
Summary: was on patrol on west side of nocona tx coming up hill saw silver disc about 1:00 aclock high
trends: There have been no other sightings in Nocona
This sighting has never been favorited.
